system.effect: Prerequisites: Blessed Power Messiah: Static Signer: Standard Action Messiah Effect: Choose two Types your Patron has Resistance or Immunity to. You gain Resistance to these types. Signer Effect: Choose a single Type your Patron has Resistance or Immunity to. You gain this Resistance to this Type until the end of the Scene. You may choose a different Type each time you use Blessed Resilience.
